I have been struggling with sleep for many years due to illness and stress. Most of the "sleep remedies" I have tried in the past simply do not work for me. However, I recently tried Gaia Herbs' "Sleep Thru" and found it to be helpful most of the times I took it.  I take 2 capsules as suggested. The name of the product is quite fitting, as I am able to stay asleep until morning. I believe that the fact that the capsules are liquid definitely contributes to their fast-acting nature. While the product is not cheap, it is definitely worth having on standby for those dreadful nights when you just need a good night's sleep.

SleepThru has been a lifesaver for me! As someone who struggles with sleep, this product has made a noticeable difference in the quality of my rest. It's natural, safe and effective, and doesn't leave me feeling groggy in the morning. I highly recommend SleepThru to anyone who wants to improve their sleep quality.
